name: TLOTJGWHFGWOHOC
description:
TLOTJGWHFGWOHOC is the acronym of : "The Legend Of The Jetpack Gentleman With His Freezing Gun Who Only Has One Chance!". Game made for the Ludum Dare 28 placed 38# in Humour category.

Welcome gent, have you ever tried a jetpack and a freezing gun?
No? Good, this game is up for you...
Use the mouse to aim...
Freeze some stuff with left click...
Flying around with right click...
Mind your hat! It contains pure Gentleman-energy(TM) for your jetpack
'Nuff said, it's time to save the world!
